alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 4:34AM CDT until May 22 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Mercer, Louisa, Des Moines and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at New Boston LD17 affecting Louisa and Mercer Counties. Mississippi River at Muscatine affecting Muscatine, Rock Island, Louisa and Mercer Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Lee, Des Moines and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Des Moines and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at New Boston LD17. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:10 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
